titles.title: Family Housing Act of 1996
To amend the United States Housing Act of 1937 to increase public housing opportunities for intact families.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking and Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

committee.name: House Committee on Banking and Financial Services

bill.summary: 1/7/1997--Introduced. Family Housing Act of 1996 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to reserve a specified percentage of public housing units for legally married families.
